PropertyList.title: Boeing 707
PropertyList.text:
_______________ Boeing 707-420/430 ___________________
Startup engines:
Open the cover from the start selector 3 in the Overhead-Panel and follow the instructions. Hold starter knob until green light is out. Start allways engines 3 - 4 - 2 - 1
Shutdown engines:
with autostart / shutdown menu
_______________________________________________________ The first 707 for Flightgear was from Innis Cunningham. This version is a revamp of that original. Nearly everthing in 3D models is written and painted new. Also the jsb fdm and the autopilot.
